attributes.action: Ban smoking in apartments including balcony.
attributes.additional_details: I believe it's not just me facing his issue but there will be many facing the same issue. Let's all join hands and take this petition forward so the we can do some good for our kids.
attributes.background: Please let's make atleast home environment safe for our children and stop smoking in balcony that affects other non smokin families. When inhaling smoke it burns our chest and similar effect for children. Have a designated area not affecting familiy. Even inhaling smoke from cigarette causes cancer.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call for a clear action from the Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition asking Parliament to ban smoking in apartments where children are present and on balconies, if that's what you want to happen.
